mapper.sql: ATTD_SN , USER_ID , REG_DT , USER_NM , TEL_NO , SEX_CD , DEVICE_TYPE_NM , CONTENT , DEL_YN , USE_FCLT_CD , REGR_IP , REG_DTTM
mapper.select: SELECT FROM TB_ATTD_INFO WHERE ATTD_SN = (SELECT MAX(ATTD_SN) FROM TB_ATTD_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{value} GROUP BY USER_ID)

SELECT ATTD_SN , USER_ID , REG_DT , USER_NM , TEL_NO , SEX_CD , DEVICE_TYPE_NM , CONTENT , DEL_YN , USE_FCLT_CD , (SELECT COM_CD_NM FROM TB_COM_CD TCC WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'USE_FCLT_CD' AND COM_CD = USE_FCLT_CD) AS USE_FCLT_NM , REGR_IP , REG_DTTM FROM TB_ATTD_INFO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND (USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchTxt}, '%') OR CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchTxt}, '%') OR (SELECT COM_CD_NM FROM TB_COM_CD TCC WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'USE_FCLT_CD' AND COM_CD = USE_FCLT_CD) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchTxt}, '%'))
AND USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchTxt}, '%')
AND CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchTxt}, '%')
AND (SELECT COM_CD_NM FROM TB_COM_CD TCC WHERE COM_GRP_CD = 'USE_FCLT_CD' AND COM_CD = USE_FCLT_CD) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{srchTxt}, '%')
ORDER BY ATTD_SN DESC
